name: Wolves Of The Mystical Forest
description:
You have travelled for many days, but now you have reached your destination. This region has been the backdrop of many tall tales, full of adventure, danger and most of all: Treasure. Many foolish sellswords have met their doom here, at the hand of the monsters roaming between the trees. But perhaps you will be the one to claim the riches hidden amidst the ancient forest?

A wilderness exploration roguelike, developed for the 7DRL challenge 2023.Your goal is to find treasure and grow more powerful.

Controls:

  • WASD for movement and selecting targets.
  • Space for confirming selections.
  • Action keys are shown at the bottom of the screen.

Assets:

  • All sprites and tiles are made by finalbossblues.
  • The music is from coppercloud.
  • The fonts used are by seliel-the-shaper / mana-seed.

We are not affiliated in any way with these artists. We just used the awesome stuff they made.
